name: Salamandra & Phoenix
text:
You can Normal Summon or Set "Immortal Phoenix Gearfried" and "Phoenix Gearfried" with 1 less Tribute during this Duel.
The following effect can be used once per Duel by revealing 1 "Immortal Phoenix Gearfried" from your hand. Set 1 "Salamandra" from outside your Deck, and send 1 "Legendary Sword" from outside your Deck to the Graveyard.
This Skill can be used/applied if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that contains at least 10 FIRE Warrior-Type monsters.
